title: Storm card
data:
{{Version027}} {{flavour|The card depicts a ship at sea sinking in a thunderstorm. Drawing this card unleashes a storm of wind and electrical discharges. Increasing card power will result in a stronger wind force and stronger more numerous discharges.}} The Storm card attempts to blow enemies away, then creates a surge of electrical explosions (similar to [[Qazlal]]) that cause significant damage to enemies. The storm will never harm the player. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.15]] ![[0.16]] ![[0.17]] and beyond |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of destruction|Destruction]]
[[Deck of war|War]] !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of destruction|Destruction]] !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of destruction|Destruction]] |---- |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.23]], the Storm card would form ring of thunder clouds about 3 tiles thick 2 tiles away from the player, and summon [[air elemental]]s. *This card was one of 23 cards to be kept in the deck simplification of [[0.19]]. *Prior to [[0.17]], the card had a 50% chance to summon a [[twister]]. *The Storm card was added in [[0.15]] to replace the [[Spark card]]. ==See also== *[[Cards]] *[[Decks]] {{Cards}} [[Category: Deck]]
